ygData.subject: Re: Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe... the motivation for necro is always there... now even more since i have face the fact that level is bloody everything in this game... perhaps until my
ygData.messageBody:
hehe... the motivation for necro is always there... now even more since i
have face the fact that level is bloody everything in this game... perhaps
until my game expires in dec.... cant believe i pay one shot 6 months....

from what i know... pet at level 34 can duel weild liaoz... just maybe
cannot do so much damage... hehe... but have to knn research... u guys with
necro words... for god sake... dont sell it... if u wanna sell it... sell it
to me! necro is one of those that have a hard life... have to research our
bloody pets.... if anyone going to OOT... help me buy my level 29 pet
spells... i know bit early... but i dont mind... since along the bloody way
mah... hehe... i will continue playing until im really tired of necro then
start anohter char...

Nic...
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 6:38 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash


> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Freddy, more motivation for you to play your Necro. At level 49, pets dual
weild
> and double attack for 4 X 60dmg ever 2 sec with a pair of combine/fine
steel
> daggers
>
> "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
>
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > would like to hunt with u... BUT... i have only one level 22 char and
the
> > rest all level 1-3... and i dont play during weekdays... cannot help u
out
> > on this one... maybe u can check out Nalfien... hes around that level i
> > think... or maybe pass that level liaoz... hehe...
> >
> > nic
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Kah Wai <kwchow@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 6:17 PM
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
> >
> > > From: "Kah Wai" <kwchow@...>
> > >
> > > 9th Order sounds good too...
> > >
> > > So far still no response for hunting, seems like only the regular high
> > level
> > > players posting left right center.... come on the rest of you! If
there
> > are
> > > any .... hehe
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 5:02 PM
> > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
> > >
> > >
> > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > >
> > > > Order........
> > > >
> > > > Kah Wai wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > From: "Kah Wai" <kwchow@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Well, just trying to do some role playing here..hehe
> > > > >
> > > > > I mean lvl actually, anyway for a Bard every level gets a new
> > song/spell
> > > :)
> > > > >
> > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 11:16 AM
> > > > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and
cash
> > > > >
> > > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Err u guys know the difference between circle and lvl? Circle
is
> > the
> > > time
> > > > > > you get new skills or spells, eg circle 1 for wiz is lvl 1, but
> > circle
> > > 2
> > > > > > mean lvl 4, circle 3 is lvl 8. Level is the normal xp lvl u
gain
> > one
> > > by
> > > > > > one.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > When u say u are a circle 9, I presume u are close to lvl 40,
hehe.
> > > Lvl
> > > > > 40
> > > > > > no need to hunt in LF la, too small fry for u ;)
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 10:02 AM, kwchow@...
> > > > > > [SMTP:kwchow@...] wrote:
> > > > > > > From: kwchow@...
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Melodeuss, Bard of 9th circle:
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Am looking for party of similar lvl to hunt in LFay Bandit
camps
> > > > > tonight,
> > > > > > need to make some dough and gain some exp. Will probably have to
> > start
> > > at
> > > > > > about 11pm there abouts, anyone interested?
